# Test for invere functions

# Weibull

```{r}

SX <- 30
PX <- 2
X <- 50
WP <- seq(0.1, 5, 0.1)
relK <- fweibull(WP, SX, PX, X)
WP_new <- inv_fweibull(relK, SX, PX, X) 

WP
WP_new

```


# Sigmoidal

```{r}

PX <- 2
a <- 5
X <- 50
WP <- seq(0.1, 5, 0.1)
relK <- fsigmoidal(WP, PX, a, X)
WP_new <- inv_fsigmoidal(relK, PX, a, X) 

WP
WP_new

```
